item.title: Europe's Risky Plan to Avert a Winter Energy Crisis: Stash Gas in Ukraine
item.description: Europe’s Risky Plan to Avert a Winter Energy Crisis: Stash Gas in Ukraine Europe is facing a potential winter energy crisis due to the war in Ukraine and the uncertainty of Russian gas supplies. One way to avert the crisis is to store gas in Ukraine, which has the largest underground gas storage system in Europe.
